alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Neshoba; Oktibbeha; Scott; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 5:34AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Choctaw, Leake, southern Oktibbeha, southeastern Attala, Winston, northern Scott and western Neshoba Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 534 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Chester to near Ludlow. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chester around 540 AM CDT. Ackerman around 545 AM CDT. Betheden around 610 AM CDT. Craig Springs and Madden around 615 AM CDT. Dowdville around 620 AM CDT. Philadelphia and Dixon around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Noxapater, Walnut Grove, Redwater, Sebastopol, Standing Pine, Lena, Mccool, Sturgis and Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Neshoba; Oktibbeha; Scott; Winston
